SEACells
========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which SEACells installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using SEACells, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load SEACells/20230731-foss-2021a
```
